Subject: The Neo Beast Wars RPG
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
X-Mailer: CompuServe 2000 32-bit sub 103
From: KSLawdogg@...

Koga Shuko/Unitron/Sixshot/Serpentor/Anubis/Hades/Double 
Punch/Manterror/Injector/Bumblebee/Smokescreen/Beachcomber/Ramhorn:




Beachcomber nodded, going faster for the CR chamber, telling Prowl to hurry.

---

Ramhorn took out a grenade, throwing it.  It exploded on top of Sixshot's 
tank mode, blowing off the top half.  In excrutiating pain, Sixshot reverted 
to robot mode, where 24 sonic shells dug into his face, abdomen, and chest, 
sending him crashing to the ground, immobile.

---

Anubis cursed, autogun fire digging into his face.  He raised a rifle, firing 
off three laser bolts, blowing apart the autogun.

---

Hades raised his laser rifle, firing off two bolts, each digging into 
Ramhorn's left thigh.

---

Serpentor fired a plasma blast from his launcher at the Ark

---

Shuko fired two optic blasts at Sniper.

---

Unitron fired a total of six laser bolts at the Ark, three from each rifle.

---

Manterror and Injector charged forward, trying to catch a flux in the shields 
to get in, ignoring the light autogun fire.

---

Double Punch fired a missile off at an autogun.
